content.description:
Super cool and doesnt get 3 stars only because the two lower blocks are off and there are a few scrunchy foot switches low. Once the line opens up, there are huge moves and awesome holds. This is recommended for sure! 

  Sit start low on the big left loaf (crimp in the middle) under the roof with higher feet below. Traverse to the right to jugs and afterward reach high and right to a crimp at the base of the roofs arête (do go further around the corner, stay under the roof). 

  Get a heel hook and reach up and out of the roof to a jug over the lip. Follow over the lip of the boulder to mantle out (with use of the high arête edge).

Thumbprint Roof is directly to the right of Thumbprint Boulder which is a huge highball 

  Thumbprint Roof is tall but once you surmount the roof it is easy enough to stand up and scramble up the rest. 

  The roof is short and pretty blank other than a few bleak pockets.
